org.eclipse.scada.sec

Interface AuthenticationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlainAuthenticationService, DummyAuthenticationProviderImpl, PropertyAuthenticationService

    public interface AuthenticationService
    An interface for a service that authenticates a user.

    The service needs to ensure that the information provided identifies a valid user.

    Since:
    0.15.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserInformation authenticate(CredentialsRequest request)
      Authenticate a user based on credentials
      UserInformation getUser(java.lang.String user)
      The the user information of the named user
      void joinRequest(CredentialsRequest request) 

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        UserInformation authenticate(CredentialsRequest request)
                             throws AuthenticationException
        Authenticate a user based on credentials
        Returns:
        a valid user information instance if the user is a known user and is allowed to log on using the provided credentials. Or null if it is a valid anonymous login.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - in the case the login is invalid (e.g. username and password don't match)

      • joinRequest

        void joinRequest(CredentialsRequest request)
        Since:
        1.1

      • getUser

        UserInformation getUser(java.lang.String user)
        The the user information of the named user
        Parameters:
        user - the user to get the information for
        Returns:
        the user information or null if the user is unknown
        Since:
        1.1
